issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

1.7.0.0.6c9e23f 3g iphone (3.1.3). Not in master or 1.6.1

1.Base UI > windows standalone
2.Tap "toggle window" and watch buttons on the bottom of screen

results: the buttons flash as the window is drawn (not seen in master or 1.6.1)

3.tap the base ui button to close the window and nav back

results: the spawned window in step 1 persists (not seen in master or 1.6.1).

{html}
fields.summary: ios_proxy_registration - Windows (stand alone) "toggle window" - window spawned does not close when spawning js is closed, and buttons flash when it draws in.

comments.body: Likely decision is to emulate old behavior, when context goes away, and no remaining contexts, window will self-destroy
TIMOB-3778 TIMOB-3784 TIMOB-3583 #fixed-in-qa When a proxy's last context closes, destroy even if still retained.

closing this - the spawned window not closing was the worst of this, splitting off a new bug for the issue with the flashing buttons. [INFO] Titanium SDK version: 1.7.0 (05/10/11 19:34 879871b...) 3g iphone 3.1.3 and ipad2 (4.3)
